SELECT d.department_name AS groupName,
DATE_FORMAT(p.pre_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS timePeriod,
CONCAT(YEAR(p.pre_time), '-', WEEK(p.pre_time)) AS timePeriod,
DATE_FORMAT(p.pre_time, '%Y-%m') AS timePeriod,
COUNT(DISTINCT p.pre_receipt_id) AS paymentCount, SUM(CASE WHEN p.pre_state != '已退费' THEN ci.chargeitem_price * p.pre_ci_num ELSE 0 END) AS paymentAmount, SUM(CASE WHEN p.pre_state = '已退费' THEN ci.chargeitem_price * p.pre_ci_num ELSE 0 END) AS refundAmount FROM prescription_info p JOIN registration_info r ON p.pre_reg_id=r.reg_id JOIN arrange_info a ON r.reg_arrange_id=a.arrange_id JOIN doctor_info doc ON doc.doc_id=a.arrange_doc_id JOIN department_info d ON doc.doc_dp_id = d.department_id JOIN chargeitems_info ci ON p.pre_ci_id=ci.chargeitem_id WHERE p.pre_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND p.pre_state IN ('待缴费','待执行','已完成','已失效','已退费') GROUP BY d.department_name,
DATE_FORMAT(p.pre_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
CONCAT(YEAR(p.pre_time), '-', WEEK(p.pre_time))
DATE_FORMAT(p.pre_time, '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY (SUM(CASE WHEN p.pre_state != '已退费' THEN ci.chargeitem_price * p.pre_ci_num ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN p.pre_state = '已退费' THEN ci.chargeitem_price * p.pre_ci_num ELSE 0 END)) DESC
